newsitem.title: THAILAND: Nava, Thaimex to merge by yearend.
newsitem.headline: Nava, Thaimex to merge by yearend.

text.p: Nava Finance and Securities Plc and Thaimex Finance and Securities Plc said on Friday they expected to merge by the end of this year.
The firms on Thursday signed a memorandum of understanding for their planned merger with CMIC Finance and Securities Plc and to apply for a new commercial banking licence.

Their planned merger follows statements by Thai authorities encouraging consolidation among the 90-odd finance firms in the country to boost efficiency and face further liberalisation and challenges in the country's troubled finance sector.
